import React, { useState, useContext } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Row, Col, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import { right } from '@popperjs/core'; import { userContext } from '../userContext'; function Convert() { const [convertAmount, setConvertAmount] = useState(0); const [currencyFrom, setCurrencyFrom] = useState(null); const [currencyTo, setCurrencyTo] = useState(null); const [currencyAvailable, setCurrencyAvailable] = useState(0); const [currencyResult, setCurrencyResult] = useState(); const msg = useContext(useContext); return ( <>
{ msg }
تبدیل
$49750 باقیمانده
 ) } export default Convert;
